Template.name: SVG
Template.Header:
<?xml version="1.0" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE svg PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD SVG 20001102//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/2000/CR-SVG-20001102/DTD/svg-20001102.dtd">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" 
  xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" 
  id="CSLMON-ClientsAndSessions" 
  version="1.1" width="$(drawingWidth)" height="$(drawingHeight)" >

  <title>CSLMON Log: Clients and Sessions [$(LogFilename)]</title>

  <style>
    .timeAxis {
      stroke: red; 
      stroke-width: 0.5
    }
    .timeVAxisMin {
      stroke: gray; 
      stroke-width: 0.7
    }
    .timeVAxisHalfMin {
      stroke: silver; 
      stroke-width: 0.5
    }
    .timeVAxisQuarterMin {
      stroke: silver; 
      stroke-width: 0.2
    }
    .timeLabel {
      font-family: Arial; 
      font-size: 8pt;
      fill: red;
    }

    .clientAxis {
      stroke: navy;
      stroke-width: 2.5;
    }
    .clientLabel {
      font-family: Arial; 
      font-size: 7pt;
      text-anchor: end;
      fill: blue;
    }

    .sessionAxis {
      stroke: teal; 
      stroke-width: 8;
    }
    .sessionAxisWait {
      stroke: silver; 
      stroke-width: 6;
    }
    .sessionAxisInit {
      stroke: magenta; 
      stroke-width: 6;
    }
    .sessionLabel {
      font-family: Arial; 
      font-size: 4pt;
      font-weight: lighter;
      fill: green;
      writing-mode: tb;
      text-anchor: end;
    }

    .txAxis {
      stroke: blue; 
      stroke-width: 0.5;
    }
  </style>

  <defs>
    
    <symbol id="_10sec" >
      <path class="timeAxis" d="
        M 0,0 l 0,7 
        M 5,0 l 0,3
        M 10,0 l 0,3
        M 15,0 l 0,3
        M 20,0 l 0,3
        M 25,0 l 0,5
        M 30,0 l 0,3
        M 35,0 l 0,3
        M 40,0 l 0,3
        M 45,0 l 0,3
        M 50,0 l 0,7
        " />
    </symbol>

    <symbol id="_1min" >
      <use x="0" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <use x="50" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <use x="100" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <use x="150" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <use x="200" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <use x="250" y="0" width="50" height="10" xlink:href="#_10sec" />
      <line class="timeAxis" id="L_0" x1="0" y1="0" x2="0" y2="10" style="stroke:navy; stroke-width:1" />
      <line class="timeAxis" id="L_1" x1="300" y1="0" x2="300" y2="10" style="stroke:navy; stroke-width:1" />
      <line class="timeAxis" id="L_1" x1="150" y1="0" x2="150" y2="6" style="stroke:navy; stroke-width:1" />
      
      <line class="timeVAxisMin"        id="L_MB"    x1="0"   y1="12" x2="0"   y2="$(drawingHeight)" />
      <line class="timeVAxisHalfMin"    id="L_Mhalf" x1="150" y1="12" x2="150" y2="$(drawingHeight)" />
      <line class="timeVAxisQuarterMin" id="L_Mq1"   x1="75"  y1="12" x2="75" y2="$(drawingHeight)" />
      <line class="timeVAxisQuarterMin" id="L_Mq2"   x1="225" y1="12" x2="225" y2="$(drawingHeight)" />
    </symbol>

  </defs>

  <!-- Begin -->

Template.name: TimeScale
Template.Item: <text x="$(x)" y="$(yLabel)" class="timeLabel" >$(time)</text> <use x="$(x)" y="$(y)" width="300" height="$(drawingHeight)" xlink:href="#_1min" />

Template.name: Clients
Template.Item: <line x1="$(clientTimeStartX)" y1="$(clientTimeY)" x2="$(clientTimeFinishX)" y2="$(clientTimeY)" class="clientAxis" /> <text x="$(clientTimeStartX)" y="$(clientTimeYlab)" class="clientLabel" >$(ClientLabel)</text>

Template.name: SessionRefs
Template.Item: <line x1="$(sessionTimeStartX)" y1="$(sessionTimeY)" x2="$(sessionTimeFinishX)" y2="$(sessionTimeY)" class="sessionAxis" /> <text x="$(sessionTimeStartX)" y="$(sessionTimeYlab)" class="sessionLabel" >$(SessionLabel)</text>
